title: David Bovill
synopsis: On this site I write about [[Livecode]], the projects I am working on and the courses I am teaching.

title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Welcome to my [[Federated Wiki]] site about the [[World of Livecode]]. Here I write about code and programming in the [[LiveScript]] and [[Livecode Builder]] languages.
